name: Dream Breath
description:
Inhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing 5 injured allies in a 30 yd cone in front of you for 22,949.

I:   Heals 4,232 instantly and 18,717 over 16 sec.

II:  Heals 8,911 instantly and 14,037 over 12 sec.

III: Heals 13,591 instantly and 9,358 over 8 sec.
